patthana15.2:4.1: Hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana15.2:5.1: Nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana15.2:6.1: Hetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca nahetuṃ sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.2:7.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.2:9.1: Hetuṃ dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.2:11.1: Hetuṃ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
